Half life 2
one of my favourite games
the way it tells its story is just amazing. you are always in control of your character 
through the wastes of city 17 to the run down prison of nova prospect to the massive citidel 
you fight your way through all the civil protection to fight for your freedom alongside some rebels
which can be quite annoying at times and can get in your way and fighting alongside Alyx 
the gunplay never feels repetitive as your always fighting in different environments 

I couldnt recommend this game anymore than i can this is a must buy for anyone with a pc especially with its cheap price tag  even on specials the level design is just amazing 

this is the game

The old legendary classic that will always make you urgent to play it again after some time. Good story, enemies, mechanics, combat, characters and map design. All three parts of this game are awesome to play with friends in cooperative mode, you can do that when you download Synergy mod.
This game cant be put in a category. Its category by itself.

Even 'till this day, one of the best single player shooters I've ever seen. Simply by having a good story, with good enough developed characters and by haivng a gameplay that constantly throws new entertaining gimmicks at you

Realmente Half-Life 2 sigue los pasos del 1 sumando cada vez mas a una historia increible, ademas de incorporar graficos y mecanicas mejores. Me encanto el mundo que presenta y los personas tan entra√±ables con los que uno se cruza e interactua, realmente atrapante y totalmente recomendable para aquellos seguidores de la franquisia, como tambien para aquellas personas que quieran divertirse un rato. Espero les guste y lo puedan disfrutar tanto como yo. Saludos!
